p: For the isolation of M6-Ctrl or M6-Hh cells for limiting dilution assays, cells were pelleted and resuspended in FACS buffer containing the following murine lineage markers (Lin +): anti-CD45-biotin (1:100; BD Pharmingen TM, Clone: 30-F11); anti-CD31-biotin (1:40; BD Pharmingen TM, Clone: 390), anti-TER119-biotin (1:80; BD Pharmingen TM, Clone: TER119), and anti-BP1-biotin (1:50; Affymetrix eBiosciences, Clone: 6C3) for 20 min on ice. Cells were then pelleted and resuspended in FACS buffer containing streptavidin-APC-Cy TM7 (1:400; BD Pharmingen TM) and anti-EpCAM-PerCp/Cy5.5 (1:500, BioLegend ®, Clone: G8.8), and incubated for 20 min on ice. Cells were then washed twice in FACS buffer before being resuspended in FACS buffer containing DAPI (1:1000; Invitrogen). Live primary M6 neoplastic cells were sorted based on their GFP +/EpCAM +/Lin − expression.
